dimensions: Warp x Weft: 30.5 x 61 cm (12 x 24 in.)
title: Rayamex Stripe
description: Plain weave in wide vertical stripes of turquoise blue, olive green and yellow-green with pairs of narrow stripes in white and violet, pink and red, and yellow and magenta. The violet threads of the weft give a variegated look to the surface of the textile. Number 1245.
name: Sample
